message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $130. This is a high-quality item worth more than its face value, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to pay the full $130. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I need to maintain a minimum price for the product due to its value. I am willing to consider $120 as a counteroffer. I hope this meets within your budget and we can move forward with the transaction.
I understand your concerns about the product's value, but I'm still not comfortable paying $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $112.50. Can you consider this revised offer?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and the discussions we've had, I am willing to accept an offer of $117.50. I believe this price reflects the product's value while also being reasonable for you. I hope this meets your expectations, and we can finalize the transaction.
I'm getting close to your offer, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $115.75. Can you consider this revised offer?
